title: Hermes Lady Belt with Diamond Belt Buckle
description: Hermes Lady Belt with Diamond belt buckle made from crocodile leather in the colour bleu sapphire. Buckle is 18ct white gold, with 135 round cut Diamonds totalling approximately 0.80cts. Buckle dimensions: 33.6mm x 20mm. Belt width: 1.2cm. Max Length: 80cm. With Hermes dust bag. With Certificate #0198178829148798. (Pre-owned)
